entries.name: Perilous
entries.description: The area is dangerously worn and prone to collapse. Any impacts or damage to the structure, including from spells and other areas of effect, have a 50 percent chance of causing a collapse.

entries.name: Crumbling
entries.description: Areas within the dungeon section are choked with rubble and have a 50 percent chance of being Difficult Terrain. Half Cover and hiding places are plentiful.

entries.name: Neglected
entries.description: One dungeon hazard — such as brown mold, green slime, or yellow mold — is abundant.

entries.name: Abandoned
entries.description: Most of the dungeon is deserted. Dexterity (Stealth) checks have Disadvantage because any sounds stand out as unusual.

entries.name: Secure
entries.description: Ability checks made to break down doors, open locks, or carry out similar activities have Disadvantage.

entries.name: Thriving
entries.description: The dungeon is heavily populated. Any loud noises draw the attention of nearby creatures.
